content: bold stripes set the stage for treble and single_crochet stitches that combine to create fun bobbles on this modern blanket for the home stitched in bernat blanket yarn geometric patterns worked in both color and plush texture are enhanced by the cozy flowing fringe simple color changes reveal neutral tones that give it modern flair but the pattern can be customized to feature any shades that reflect your style add warmth to a room with this easy blanket that complements any interior setting
